articles.description: A good night's sleep lowers your risk of heart disease, obesity and diabetes and also alleviates stress. Nutritionists suggest foods that can help you sleep better. | Health
articles.content: People who sleep better are the ones who are likely to fall sick less often than poor sleepers. A good night's sleep lowers your risk of heart disease, obesity and diabetes and also alleviates stress… [+2507 chars]
